actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution relating to the withdrawal of all minerals in certain areas of the Los Padres National Forest, Calif., from all forms of appropriation under the mining law and from disposition under all laws pertaining to mineral leasing.

summary.text: Withdraws from all forms of appropriation under the mining laws and from disposition under all laws pertaining to mineral leasing and all amendments thereto; all minerals in a specified area within the Los Padres National Forest, California.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the withdrawal of all minerals in certain areas of the Los Padres National Forest, Calif., from all forms of appropriation under the mining law and from disposition under all laws pertaining to mineral leasing.
